root: ^Hello! My name is CARL: Computer-building Assistant and Robotic Lecturer.
^My goal is to teach students about the different parts of a computer and how to build one themselves by using Augmented Reality!
^As you can see, this is quite a different way of teaching than this app used to have.
^My creator was unhappy with the previous system, since students would just see a block of text and feel bored
^However, now that I'm here, students can be taught directly by a friendly robot!
^As you can see, I have a range of expressions to help create a dynamic experience. I also give the illusion of speaking by using some cute robotic beeps!
^It has the additonal feature of preventing students from skipping all the text. They can't move on to the next textbox until I'm done speaking.
^For now, this is all I can show, as I'm currently hard at work implementing the rest of the features into the app in time for Create.
^However, I will do my best to continue bringing new and exciting updates to you.
^I hope you like the new presentation! Let me know if you have any suggestions or questions!
